name: Out Of Sight (itch) (Kizilejderha)
description:
Survive 90 seconds in the middle of a wheat field as the harvest goes on.

WASD to move 

Space to Dash 

E to menu (only if you are dead) 

R to reset (only if you are dead)

Use your camouflage to hide in grass, hunters won’t see you if you are not moving. if you are seen, you will need to get out of their vision before you are shot.
